channel.title: YouTube on Nathan Obert
channel.description: Recent content in YouTube on Nathan Obert

item.title: How to Rent Camera Gear at LensRental.com
item.description: Introduction How to Rent Camera Gear at LensRental.com Video

item.title: Lowepro Truckee BP 250 Camera Bag Review
item.description: Introduction Review of the Lowepro Truckee BP 250 Camera Bag Video

item.title: Aputure MC RGBWW Led Light Unboxing
item.description: Introduction Today I unbox the Aputure MC RGBWW Led Light. I review the capability and use of the aputure light. Video

item.title: SmallRig 1/4” to Hotshoe Adapter
item.description: Introduction We provide a quick unboxing and review of the SmallRig 1/4” to Hotshoe Adapter. Video

item.title: GorillaPod RIG 5K Unboxing and Review
item.description: Introduction Today we review and Unbox a GorillaPod RIG 5K. The GorillaPod is the standard for VLOGGERS, and the RIG provides additional features. Video

item.title: Haida Installation on Sony FE 1.7 / 14 GM
item.description: Introduction What are ND Filters & Haida Installation on Sony FE 1.7 / 14 GM. Today we first explain what ND filters are, how they can be used. We tackle how to install ND Filters, and finally we will install a rear Haida ND filter on the Sony FE 1.7 / 14 GM Lens. Video

item.title: How to stream video using Sony A7IV
item.description: Introduction How to stream video using Sony A7IV. I provide instructions on how to setup Live Streaming with the Sony A7IV on Mac and Windows. Video

item.title: Sony FE 1.8 / 14 GM Lens Review
item.description: Introduction Review of Photography with the Sony FE 1.8 / 14 GM Lens, using Sony A7IV. Video
